item.title: Congress, Not the Attorney General, Should Decide the Future of Encryption
item.description: Authors: Alan Z. Rozenshtein Published: February 2020 URL: https://www.lawfareblog.com/congress-not-attorney-general-should-decide-future-encryption Tags: 2020s End-to-End Encryption Going Dark Section 230 US Congress Abstract: If Congress wants to restrict end-to-end encryption, it should do so directly and not, as in the EARN IT Act, pass the buck to someone else.
